name: ListWorkweekConfigurations
description:
Retrieve workweek configurations for a business.

This tool returns a list of workweek configuration instances, providing details about the workweek setup for a specified business. It should be used when you need to understand or analyze the workweek parameters configured within a business.

parameters.name: max_results_per_page
parameters.description: The maximum number of workweek configurations to return per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of `WorkweekConfigs` results to return per page.

parameters.name: page_cursor
parameters.description: A string that acts as a pointer to fetch the next page of workweek configuration results.

value_schema.description: A pointer to the next page of `WorkweekConfig` results to fetch.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of `WorkweekConfigs` results to return per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of `WorkweekConfigs` results to return per page.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A pointer to the next page of `WorkweekConfig` results to fetch.

value_schema.description: A pointer to the next page of `WorkweekConfig` results to fetch.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
